DECLARE @sql_col NVARCHAR(1000); SELECT @sql_col = ISNULL(@sql_col + ',','') + QUOTENAME(SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), YearPeriod), 1, 7)) FROM Transactions GROUP BY YearPeriod ORDER BY YearPeriod;
DECLARE @sql NVARCHAR(2000); SET @sql = N' WITH Data AS (SELECT VendorCode, VendorName, GroupID, COUNT(DISTINCT InvoiceNo) AS Invoices, SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), YearPeriod), 1, 7) AS YearPeriod FROM Transactions JOIN Vendors ON VendorID = VendorCode WHERE VendorCode IS NOT NULL GROUP BY VendorCode, VendorName, GroupID, YearPeriod) SELECT * FROM Data PIVOT (SUM([invoices]) FOR YearPeriod IN ('+@sql_col+')) AS PivotTable '; EXEC(@sql);
